com.eemi.ext4j.client.draw

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.draw.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Ellipse, Image, Path, Rectangle, Text

    public class Sprite
extends JsObject
    A Sprite is an object rendered in a Drawing surface.

      • getDragSource

        public DragSource getDragSource()
        If this Sprite is configured draggable, this property will contain an instance of Ext.dd.DragSource which handles dragging the Sprite.

        The developer must provide implementations of the abstract methods of DragSource in order to supply behaviour for each stage of the drag/drop process. See draggable.

        Returns:

      • destroy

        Removes the sprite and clears all listeners.

        Hides the sprite.

        public void hide(boolean redraw)
        Hides the sprite.
        Parameters:
        redraw - , Flag to immediately draw the change.

      • redraw

        public Sprite redraw()
        Redraws the sprite.

      • remove

        public boolean remove()
        Removes the sprite.
        Returns:
        True if sprite was successfully removed. False when there was no surface to remove it from.
